CONTENT_ITEM.CONTENT_VAR: Article appeared in take23, discussing how Pagekit seperates the development of your site into manageable components without using embedded Perl code.

Rewrote Apache::PageKit::Model to support OO pluggable modules. These modules are simply Perl classes derived from Apache::PageKit::Model containing methods that take request parameters and set view variables.

Major changes in API and streamlining in preparation for 1.0 beta release. Introduced <PKIT_*>, <MODEL_*> and <VIEW_*> tags. Templates get pre-parsed and cached using file_cache option of HTML::Template.

Replaced Apache::PageKit::Info with Apache::PageKit::Config and Apache::PageKit::Content. Better support for language localization. Reorganization of files into Model, View, Content, and Controller Directories. Improved test suite to use Apache::test to run and test working copy of pagekit.org site.
